Pre-Game Insights: Croatia has never won a game in the European knockout stages, and this year is probably not going to be any different.
Albania might be in position for an improbable run to the group stage if they upset Croatia.
When Albania plays patiently till the very end, they are a more formidable squad.
Croatia’s hopes of making it to the knockout phase are hampered by their goal differential absorbing a -3 setback in the opening game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia faced Spain and all of their worst concerns came true as Spain’s ability and pace overwhelmed Croatia en route to three goals in the first half.
Nedim Bajrami’s goal against Italy 23 seconds into the competition opened gave Albania’s Euro bid the perfect start.
Albania’s goal in their opening Group of Death match was the fastest in European history.
Croatia’s poor goal scoring record will allow them to play the style they want.
Others: The game is a part of Group B of the Euro.
The game is scheduled to take place at the Volksparkstadion stadium in Hamburg, Germany, on June 19.
CSB Sports will be broadcasting the game, and it can also be streamed on fubo.tv.
